title: Alvarenga
body: It was André Gonçalves Alvarenga who introduced this surname to this island. He was a native of Beira and came with his family to settle in Funchal around the year 1500.

Funchal: Location where André Gonçalves Alvarenga settled with his family around the year 1500

André Gonçalves Alvarenga: Introduced the surname Alvarenga to the island of Madeira and settled in Funchal

1500: André Gonçalves Alvarenga came with his family to settle in Funchal
